/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. On the right side of the street, there's a lamppost standing tall, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls.

In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting two parts of the city. Power lines run parallel to the street, a common sight in many urban areas. The image beautifully encapsulates a typical day in Beijing, blending the hustle and bustle of city life with the tranquility of nature.
